name: Void Scavenge
description:
A hidden object maze made for Eggplant Podcast Community Game Jam #1: "Going into the Void"

Controls: mouse/touch for click-to-move or use arrow keys for 8-direction movement

Objective: someone somewhere expects you to find some items, but they only want three at any one time, and they only let you know the shape of the items. Requested items are shown in the bottom left. Find all they request to win!

Credits
  • Brick floor image from Mega Castle and Dungeon Pack by Robert Brooks, purchased in the Humble Game Dev Map & Level Creator Bundle
  • Item images by Rexard, purchased in the Humble Game Dev Icons Bundle
  • UI images from the UI Pack: Space Expansion by Kenney
  • Font: Righteous by Astigmatic
